item.title: Datastructures - Lecture 01
item.description: In the first lectures of the datastructures we’ll repeat a few things that were already covered in the Algorithm & Programming Lecture so you may want to refer those blog posts as well. After all both courses belong to the same module. Computational Effort & Complexity To compare datastructures and algorithms in regards to efficiency we need a way to measure the “cost” / computational effort. This is done by counting the required computing “steps” (Rechenschritte).
